metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35538 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A crafted input file could cause a null pointer dereference in jcopy_sample_rows() when processed by libjpeg-turbo.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35538` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
libturbojpeg - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.6').
